top_comments.comment: Well, we have to admit that Chucky is way sexier than Dave
Holy mother of god violet your voice has become legend

comments_since_last_sample.body: Please do BAD HABITS by sheeran
I can't wait till I can buy this off of iTunes.
In the air tonight by In this mo... oh... my bad.
Big fan of all your stuff, though I was genuinely worried clicking on this one. The original is my favourite song of all time, but you absolutely smashed it!!!

Estou feliz que descobri que a Violet é brasileira pq agora posso comentar coisas do tipo:
"Mais uma braba lansada pela violet!" 
Continuem quebrando tudo!!
